name: inmoov-site
description: Site do projeto InMoov - Mão Robótica Controlada

scripts.setup: mkdir -p libs && curl -o libs/three.module.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.132.2/build/three.module.js && curl -o libs/OrbitControls.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.132.2/examples/jsm/controls/OrbitControls.js && curl -o libs/GLTFLoader.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.132.2/examples/jsm/loaders/GLTFLoader.js

author: Cauã Tavares
